intro: Brandisia rosea var. flava, commonly known as the yellow brandisia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its delicate, clustered yellow flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its leaves are typically elliptical and glossy, providing a striking contrast to the vibrant blooms. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in gardens and greenhouses due to its aesthetic appeal.
